name: DiveMaster - Guide scuba divers in the best underwater deep sea diving adventure game, collect and share photos about ocean animals
name_original: DiveMaster - Guide scuba divers in the best underwater deep sea diving adventure game, collect and share photos about ocean animals
description:
Optimized for large screens

Your divegroup wants you to guide them under the sea and show them the amazing wildlife – they want to take stunning photos and share with friends.

WE NEED YOU! Start your career as the new dive master!
* Show us that you can guide the highest number of divers underwater
* Let them to take the most beautiful photos ever and share with friends
* Learn more about the underwater animals
* Kids-friendly approach - no violence just fun

Get a life worth living:  become the best divemaster in the world! 

User review: "Very different from other games! Great challenge!"

Divephotoguide.com:

"The idea of the game is to guide the divers under your control to the marine creatures they want to photograph. Every successful snap scores you tips that can be used to equip your divers with more gear and diving skills. One of coolest accolades you can pick up along the way, naturally, is “DivePhotoGuide”—if you manage to keep one of your divers alive long enough to take 25 photos in a row!"

* * *

FEATURES

64 FUN-PACKED DIVEGROUPS
 Find and photo dozens of beautiful fishes and animals at the Adventure mode — through day and night dives, from the shallow waters until the extreme depth!

FILL YOUR PHOTO ALBUM
Meet sharks, dolphins, turtles, whales, giant animals, tiny fishes, angry rays! Share your photos with friends and earn extra tips!

COLLECT a TIP after each photo taken.  
Use coins to upgrade your divers and your skills to be able to discover the ocean. Invite your friends and receive free coins to be spend in the diveshop!

UNLOCK NEW GAME MODE
The Endless diving modes offers you competition: countless hours of diving in crystal clear tropical waters!

THE TOUGHEST COMPETITION IN THE WORLD – CHECK THE ENDLESS-MODE
Can you concentrate on 8 divers simultaneously? Yes? And forever? Will see… Show us who can guide the highest number of divers under the water!

LIFT DANGEROUS GARBAGE OUT OF THE WATER
Are you environment savvy? After each garbage removed, you get extra coins as bonus. Good divemasters deserve the extra tip!

FIND Treasure chests left by pirates and lift out them from underwater and receive a well-deserved tip.

LIVE THE DIVE LIFE OF A TRUE DIVEMASTER!
 Watch your divers becoming seasoned pros: train to, equip them show the the beauty of our mother nature!

COMPETE FOR GLORY
Challenge your friends: who is the best divemaster on the face of the ocean planet or ours?! Let’s start the Endless mode and we will find out… Leaderboards are missing your score!

ACHIEVEMENTS
Your last divegroup is safe now? OK. Good job. Now let’s try it without giving them that extra tank and you will be rewarded by the “Tank savvy achievement”. Let’s unlock all!

AUTHENTIC DIVING BEHIND THE SCENES
Depth related air consumption, industry standard diving tanks and dive certification philosophy, special equipments (underwater horn, lift bags) and day-to-day practices. Start your divemaster training here!

WARNING: Be careful!
Divers consumes their air supply based on real diving physics. Just like in real life. If they run short, they can die. But you have a powerful help – you can give them an extra tank of air! Please, please, we beg you, do not let them die!
